description: Enterprise-grade email and communications management platform with AI-powered triage, multi-client support, role-based access, and real-time analytics for SFG Aluminium operations
capabilities: Unified email account management (Exchange, Gmail, IMAP)
AI-powered email triage and classification (<5s processing)
Multi-client support (Outlook, Spark, Mailspring Pro, Gmail, Apple Mail, Thunderbird)
Real-time email processing analytics and metrics
Mobile app recommendations and setup guides (iOS/Android)
Progress tracking and implementation roadmap visualization
MS Office 365 and Gmail OAuth authentication (future)

workflows.name: Email Account Onboarding
workflows.description: Add new email accounts to the communications hub with automated configuration
steps: Enters account credentials (email, password, server details)
System validates connection and tests authentication
Account added to database with sync status
Staff notified of new account availability

workflows.name: Email Client Configuration
workflows.description: Generate platform-specific configurations for email clients
steps: Chooses preferred email client (Mailspring, Outlook, etc.)
Downloads config file or provides setup instructions
User imports config into email client

workflows.name: AI Email Triage
workflows.description: Automatically classify and route incoming emails
steps: Email classified by department (Sales, Operations, Finance, HR)
Routing rules applied based on classification

workflows.name: Real-time Monitoring
workflows.description: Track email processing and system health in real-time
steps: Dashboard displays live stats (processed count, success rate)
Alerts triggered for errors or degraded performance

workflows.name: Mobile Setup Assistance
workflows.description: Guide users through mobile email client setup
